service.title: Safety First
service.content: Experienced staff and professionally trained chauffeurs

service.title: Reasonable Rates
service.content: We can offer you the right vehicle at the right price to fit your budget

service.title: Largest Fleet
service.content: We offer an extensive fleet of vehicles including sedans, limousines and coach buses

service.title: Nationwide Service
service.content: We provide our transportation services nationwide

customerservice.title: Exceptional Customer Service
customerservice.content: By offering exceptional service with no detail unattended, we have been fortunate enough to have developed into the leading provider of ground transportation in the area. Our goal is to make your travels safe, effortless and on schedule.

footer.content: Berry Cab was founded in 2010 by two friends who wanted to provide affordable luxury transportation services to their clients.In 2012, Berry Cab expanded its operations to offer car rentals in Paris and surrounding areas.
